# Calender

```{r lecturePlanCal,eval=TRUE, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
options(knitr.kable.NA = '')
library(dplyr)
library(kableExtra)
readxl::read_excel("div/lectureplan-V26.xlsx", sheet = "Sheet1",
                           col_types= rep("text",4)) %>% 
  kbl(escape = FALSE) %>%
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("condensed", "hover"),
                fixed_thead = T) %>%
    row_spec(row = c(1:2,6:7,10:11,13:14), background = "#B5983B", color = "white") %>%
  row_spec(row = c(3:5, 8:9,12), 
           background = "black", color ="white" )
    #row_spec(28, bold = T, background = "DarkRed", color = "white")

```
